kb3.name: kb3_apilog
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE kb3_apilog ( log_site VARCHAR( 20 ) NOT NULL , log_keyname VARCHAR( 20 ) NOT NULL , log_posted INT NOT NULL , log_errors INT NOT NULL , log_ignored INT NOT NULL , log_verified INT NOT NULL , log_totalmails INT NOT NULL , log_source VARCHAR( 20 ) NOT NULL , log_type VARCHAR( 20 ) NOT NULL , log_errorcode INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', log_timestamp DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
